ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Enhanced my knowledge of the language whilst also learning more about cultural aspects of Brazil.
I was able to learn a new language by taking this class.
I learned about Brazilian culture in relation to memory
I strengthened basic portuguese skills and learned about tenses.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Really interesting content, with small and collaborative classes.
You are participating every day in this class, and because of that, you learn the material a lot better.
The course is engaging because it presents authentic materials from Brazil. I wouldve liked to see more things from other Portuguese-speaking countries.
I think that we could spend more structured time and instruction on grammar rules and tenses.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, I have really enjoyed this semester.
I would recommend this course to another student because it is a great way to learn a new language.
I would recommend it to anyone interested in learning Portuguese by engaging with Brazilian culture
Yes. I think that it is a collaborative and fun learning environment.
